front.title: Translation of SMIv2 MIB Modules to YANG Modules

abstract.t: YANG is a data modeling language used to model configuration andstate data manipulated by the NETCONF protocol, NETCONF remoteprocedure calls, and NETCONF notifications. The Structure ofManagement Information (SMIv2) defines fundamental data types, anobject model, and the rules for writing and revising MIB modules foruse with the SNMP protocol. This document defines a translation ofSMIv2 MIB modules into YANG modules, enabling read-only access todata objects defined in SMIv2 MIB modules via NETCONF.
